item.title: 2022 年，达米安-博斯切托偶然发现了一具距今 7000 万年的巨大化石，这竟然是一具几乎完整的长颈恐龙骨架。
item.description:

And it all happened while he was walking his dog.https://t.co/Mb2Dgd5kox pic.twitter.com/sbSG0NypyJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 5, 2024

item.title: 科罗拉多州州务卿杰娜-格里斯沃尔德（Jena Griswold）就最高法院允许前总统特朗普出现在选票上的决定发表讲话："该决定存在一个危险的隐忧......这几乎为宣誓叛乱分子竞选联邦公职敞开了一扇选票准入之门。"
item.description:
Colorado Sec. of State Jena Griswold on SCOTUS' decision to allow former Pres. Trump to appear on the ballot: "There is a dangerous concern from its decision ... It pretty much leaves open a door to ballot access for oath-breaking insurrectionists to run for federal office." pic.twitter.com/Kga3xMFRnH

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 5, 2024
